src_original: praviśāmi mahāguhyaṃ buddhanāṭakasaṃbhavam //  avaivartikacakrādyaṃ mahāmokṣapuraṃ varaṃ //
praveśa māṃ mahācārya sarvaguhyakuloccayam //  dadasva me mahābhāgaṃ avaivartyabhiṣecanaṃ //  dadasva me mahācārya lakṣaṇasyānumodanaṃ //
ayaṃ evāmukanāmnā bodhicittaparigrahaḥ //  icchate guhyacakre 'smin praveṣṭāṃ samayasaṃvaram //
icchase tvaṃ mahātman mahāguhyakulaṃ śuddhaṃ rahasyaṃ parigrhṇitum /
buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṅghaṃ ca triratnaśaraṇaṃ vraja //
etad buddhakule ramye saṃvaraṃ bhavate dṛḍham //
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca tvayā grāhyā mahāmate //
yad bodhicittaṃ tad vajraṃ prajñā ghaṇṭā iti smṛtā //
caturdānaṃ pradātavyaṃ tridive ca trirātrike //  āmīṣābhayadharmākhyā maitrī ratnakuloccaye //
